img_above_text:
## Black Myth: Wukong Golden Carp Location
The Golden Carp Curios item can be found in The Webbed Hollow upon defeating Yellow Loong.
img_below_text:
Goldflora Hairpin
For even more guides and tips on finding all the items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, where to find new Weapons, and all the Armor and Gear sets in the game.

img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the player battling the boss "Yellow Loong" in a lush, forested environment. This encounter is significant as defeating Yellow Loong grants the "Golden Carp" Curios item, which is located in The Webbed Hollow. The image visually supports the preceding guide text, helping players identify the boss and setting for acquiring the item.
